body: Goblins are known for their balloonlike heads and enormous maws, but some have even more exaggeratedly large heads filled with razor-sharp teeth. Goblins with this trait gain a bite attack as a primary natural attack that deals 1d4 points of damage. This racial trait replaces skilled.
name: Hard Head, Big Teeth
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Goblins/Alternate Racial Traits/Hard Head/Big Teeth
